thread.title: Fed’s Kashkari Says Wage Gains Could Affect Rate Outlook

author: Michael S. Derby
title: Fed’s Kashkari Says Wage Gains Could Affect Rate Outlook

organizations.name: kashkari says wage gains could affect rate outlook federal reserve bank of minneapolis

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said Friday in a television interview a pickup in wage growth may sway his interest rate outlook.
Speaking on CNBC television after the release of the January jobs data, Mr. Kashkari said “the most important thing I saw” in the hiring report “is wage growth.” He added “if wage growth continues, that could have an impact on the path of interest rates.”
